website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive, comfortable hanging chair. Ideal for child or teenager's bedroom.
pros: The CCTRO chair was lightweight and easy to relocate
Despite how light the chair was, the materials felt reliable
We also appreciated how easy it was to remove the fabric so you're able to wash it
cons: Fabric wears after being left outdoors for extended periods

customer_reviews.title: So incredibly comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I painted the pole a soft mint green. It looks so pretty. It's so comfortable on it. I sit on it everyday. More comfortable then my living room chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bowell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Update: The seller has contacted me and given me a full refund on my order and is also sending me a new swing. This, in my opinion is excellent customer service. I am very impressed and am changing my review. Bought this for my daughter for Christmas with the bracket that was suggested but when we went to hang the hammock there was no rope to hang it with so the bracket does absolutely no good. Needless to say my daughter is not a happy camper and we can’t hang her chair
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations it's comfortable and it fits perfectly in the small area that ...
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations it's comfortable and it fits perfectly in the small area that I have and easy to hang up. I bought a couple of hooks and I can unhook my swing and take it in the house if I want.
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: My kids say our back porch now feels like a vacation spot!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well made and super comfortable! Add a palm plant and your porch will feel like you're on vacation!
customer_reviews.author: H Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Mom thought is was great!
customer_reviews.text: Its a gift for grand daughter, she has not receive it yet. Mom thought is was great!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Very comfy. I had one with just strings and the strings would dig into your legs. I really like the fabric. And the color is more of a linen color. I did have to buy hardware (2 S hooks and 2’ of chain) was $15. So not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jl.riggs

customer_reviews.title: We love the rope hammock
customer_reviews.text: We love the rope hammock. It is just what we were looking for. Great comfort for all sizes and weights. Perfect outside chair. I would recommend that you purchase the Marathon Swing Hanger to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: this came with fast one day shipping i got from prime so i was super exited and when it came it was sealed up ...
customer_reviews.text: allright let me state some facts , this came with fast one day shipping i got from prime so i was super exited and when it came it was sealed up neatly and as i found the perfect place to put it its so confortable and comes with two pillows they match with practically anything this is probably the best thing iv bought on amazon definetly repurchasing as a gift or for another spot LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Manoj

customer_reviews.title: Seller is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Originally reviewed as 1 star because when I received the swing, it unfortunately reeked of mildew as if it sat in a wet warehouse for months. The seller IMMEDIATELY, without question, issued a refund an incredibly kind email apolozing and offering a replacement. What incredible customer service!! I’ve had a chance to actually set up the swing and it is exactly what I wanted! Perfect and comfortable. I’m hoping the smell will go away while sitting in the fresh air, if not am definitely going to reorder. Highly recommend this seller and the product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Mishelle

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hammock! It holds up really well and is of good material! I have fallen asleep many times in this! I got some fairy lights and wrapped them around the top and its just perfect! If you dont have an indoor hammock, you are missing out!
customer_reviews.author: Coty

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Edit: The manufacturer contacted me within a few hours and will be sending a new chair with the proper parts! Thank you so much! I ordered this the end of October as a Christmas gift for my daughter bedroom. I am not putting it up and it's missing the rope part that you hang from the hardware. So it literally does me no good and I have been holding onto it for 2 months before I even opened the package.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Erwin

customer_reviews.title: NO, NO and NO!!!
customer_reviews.text: This nothing I hate more than deception. The picture used for this listing shows healthy pillows making the Hammock look inviting, comfortable... They sent small, flat pillows that don't even meet in the center without completely disappearing in the Hammock. AND they had the NERVE to put them in an air tight bag like they would grow once I cut the plastic. I waited a long time to buy this and looked forward to getting it when I did. SOOOO DISAPPOINTED!!! Maybe the people that gave 5 ratings got the proper accessories for the Hammock but I sure didn't. I say DO NOT BUY!!! RETURNING! and I want my amazon credits back too!
customer_reviews.author: Just my opinion!

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters 16th birthday. She enjoys it. It could use some additional length it hangs a bit high from an 8 foot beam. I would suggest some chain link to adjust the height.
customer_reviews.author: frequent _flyer

customer_reviews.title: Great company to deal with
customer_reviews.text: Hung funny, nice quality and although I returned it the company offered to send me another one. I had already purchased something different however I would definitely purchase from this company again as they are willing to work with you.
customer_reviews.author: GMB

customer_reviews.title: It came incomplete
customer_reviews.text: It didn't even come with a metal ring in the rope. Do I use a large carabiner?? I was really excited about this. I even bought a different hammock for my new home. It was cheap but at least it was complete. Returning when I get the chance.
customer_reviews.author: YggdrasilYggy

customer_reviews.title: Cute chair, seller resolved odor issue
customer_reviews.text: Update: the seller contacted me & offered to replace or refund to make things right. They promptly carried out their promise. Previous: The chair itself is cute, but the smell was awful. It had a damp, musty odor, like it had been too long in a wet, unventilated warehouse. Because my daughter really wanted the chair, I tried hand washing it & that removed most of the unpleasant odor. It was frustrating to have to deal with the issue. Also, the pillows are much smaller than they appear online, but we just replaced them with some big throw pillows to make it comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Momofthree

customer_reviews.title: My tailbone is bruised
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 110lbs and got this chair at Christmas. It's been used maybe 10 times since I got it now that the weather is finally warmer and is stored away out of the elements when not in use. I was sitting on it today and out of nowhere the bar cracked and I fell more than 8 inches to the ground. The picture I took is after the shock and initial pain wore off enough for me to move to twist to take the photo. Very dangerous. If it was any higher I may have had a broken bone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Elefteriadis

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I just got a defective item.
customer_reviews.text: Hung it up today and as soon as I sat in it ropes snapped. It's now on it's way to the dump. Edit. After my initial review the seller shipped out a replacement ASAP. After hanging the new one I am very satisfied with the product. Not sure why the first one failed but this new one feels very sturdy. Thank you for making things right.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter for Christmas. Because of a move, we only just hung it up 3 days ago for the first time. Today we hear a loud noise from her room and she said the pieces slipped on one side. So my husband fixed it by just sliding the one side back in place. A few minutes later we hear a loud crash. It fell again but this time the top piece snapped and made her fall on the floor. Doesn't hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I've had this up for about one month in my screen porch and I just love it! I sit in it every single day. I wouldn't keep it outside - I'm not sure it would hold up to weather. But in the screen porch, it's holding up well. I did take one star off because one of the ropes has already come undone and I had to re-tie it outside of the knot of ropes. I don't imagine it will hold up for more than a year or so, but for the price and how much I'm using it, I'll buy another when this one gives out.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 7 year old daughter after two days the right side of the swing ,the rope keeps sliding to the left. I feel I recieved a defective swing and would appreciate an email back. M.lopez.76@hotmail.com. Customer Service was wonderful. They addressed my concerns and immediately sent me a new swing. Have had no problems since. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy, very durable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. They go the distance and last! I bought them for a cargo ship ship to relax and enjoy, one year later we still have them,still comfortable, still in use. They sit outside in the sun exposed to all weather and sea conditions from the artic in Greenland to the Antarctic in mcmerdo and everything in between!
customer_reviews.author: Reticenti

customer_reviews.title: A good swing, but not one for the long haul.
customer_reviews.text: Meh.... it was GREAT for the first few months. We hung it on our porch undercover... but it still got all moldy in the seat, on the included pillows and along the wooden bar. The pillows aren't anything great, but were a nice thing to have included. I'm not upset though, we had it in the summer months and got TONS of use out of it and I think we paid like $35 bucks for this, so you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: MomaLary

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to surprise our daughter. It was the perfect size to hang in her room. The swing can be removed from the support pole for easy washing. Hanging was simple. One thing to note... This does NOT come with the bracket from which to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: Traci K

customer_reviews.title: Mildew smell
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived smelling very strongly of mildew right out of the box . We had to immediately removed it from the house and it cannot be used. I’m disappointed, I was really looking forward to using this swing.
customer_reviews.author: Jsthiel

customer_reviews.title: They are very sucky
customer_reviews.text: NOT for outdoor unless you want to grow a mold farm. After 1-month strings start to break..... I mean it's cheap, but I just expected a bit more life outta them.
customer_reviews.author: Mical GT

customer_reviews.title: Smelled
customer_reviews.text: When I recieved the product it smelled like it had been in a warehouse with water damage or too much moisture. I washed everything before use I even soaked the wooden pole to rid the smell. It made the smell milder than what it was when I received it but it still has a faint water damaged smell. But other than that it is sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Kenisha

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 of these and they have lasted through ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and they have lasted through the summer. Fabric is strong, and have even held a 4 year old who likes to bounce in them. I’d buy them all over again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Hammock
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this hammock for a few weeks. We actually took it off the wood bar and hung it between two trees with caribeeners and hooks. It is very comfy and held over 200 lbs. It has been outside in the rain and so far we haven't had any issues with that. The fabric dries really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Indoor use hammock
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter to be used in bedroom. Needed additional hardware. Had to be adjusted for appropriate length from ceiling too. She did love it for a few months but less then 6 months of in door use and the hammock already fraying and breaking
customer_reviews.author: MomOfMany

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Fun, Fun
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun piece of decor for my teenage daughter and her beach themed room. She has this hanging in the corner as a reading corner. She loves to go and swing and lounge in her chair. She is a tiny thing but this is so sturdy and holds me (160 lbs) and even holds my husband at (220 lbs). Such a great product and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: IW

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy, Will Not Support Over 150lbs
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved this chair. While the pillows are on the small side, it was still very comfortable. However, it absolutely will NOT support up to 260 pounds. The bar broke when my daughter sat in the chair, and she tops out at 156 pounds. Since I can't find a replacement bar the chair is now useless. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: ChanLee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hanging chair 💕
customer_reviews.text: Great hanging chair! It is sooo soft and cozy I just want to lay in it ALL THE TIME! It is very high quality and a great deal for the price. I love that it came with two pillows that are so squishy! The only reason I am giving this product four stars is because, when it came out of the package it had a weird smell to it but, I just sprayed it with frebreeze and had to let it air out. Overall amazing product would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sav_lax

customer_reviews.title: Sensory
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and hung inside my daughter’s room as a calming swing. She loves it and it gives her soothing alone time.
customer_reviews.author: alexisolivia

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: It actually looks better than I expected. I bought this for my granddaughter, and it appears to be a good choice. I'm very delighted that it came as a multicolored item with a carry bag, not like what's shown in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Catmom

customer_reviews.title: great swing
customer_reviews.text: I am a big guy just under the weight limit And I enjoy swinging like a little kid so I twisted my eye hook out and fell no damage to the sp Swing but my pride took a hit lol ...just secure well
customer_reviews.author: Jerrad m dugger

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy again
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this. It’s in our daughters’ room. They love to play on it, and it’s so helpful for these dark cold days where they can’t get their energy out outside. We installed a board in the attic for extra durability. It’s very comfortable and great for rocking little ones to Sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Evans

customer_reviews.title: Super smelly
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I am not giving 5 stars is because it came smelling horribly of mold and mildew. It was damp and wrapped in plastic. Took forever to air out and lots of fabric freshener
customer_reviews.author: Samantha burnsed

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price! Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our daughter with special needs who is 13 years old, and it looks great in her room and is a great size for her to rest in. Totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase!!! I was so excited to try this out on my new deck. I’m 7 months pregnant and wanted something really comfy for me and my kids to hangout in. This was very simple to install. I ordered some supplies on here to hook it to because it did not come with anything. However for the price point that was not an issue at all and it stated it in the description. Overall, it is very stylish, comfortable and a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Des crothers

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: I'll give it 2 stars because it looks like it's well made and my son loved it. We returned it because of a very strong musty smell that wouldn't air out.
customer_reviews.author: AKoist

customer_reviews.title: Great item!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair! Daughter is going to love it!! Delivered to the wrong address! Neighbor had no idea who I was! Delivery person should have never left it with that neighbor. Especially after seeing the surroundings!! I’m lucky I got the package!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Anders

customer_reviews.title: Great for my kids room
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for each of my children's new rooms. they absolutely love them! The quality of the suspension ropes and fabric of the swing seat is high enough quality that I feel confident sitting in it at 230 Ibs. I wouldn't suggest this for outdoor use as the fabric would be difficult to clean. We upgraded the pillows with some nice plush ones and that has greatly increase the comfort of the hammock. The included pillows are just too small and not very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Love this hammock chair!
customer_reviews.text: A year and a half later this hammock chair is still going strong. We need to get another because it's the chair that we all want to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea of this chair swing but the truth is that it's not very comfortable. It's fun to sit in for a few minutes but this isn't something I'd buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great place to hang
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome and just what I was looking for. It looks just like the picture, except that the pillows don’t fill up as much of it as it looks like. The only issue I had is that I had to go buy a chain and hook to hang it because it doesn’t come with it. Not falsely advertised, just a little less convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Fogelberg

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Smelled funny when I got it but hit it with febreze and it was fine. The fabric is kinda thin. Works fine for kids because of weight.
customer_reviews.author: michelle martin

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY CUTEEEE I’m in love. This chair is exactly what I was looking for. I was thinking it was going to be cheap quality for the price but it wasnt at all. It was very sturdy. It also comes with the pillows which is cute. You have to buy a chain because it doesn’t come with anything to hang it up with. I’m definitely buying a second one for my balcony.
customer_reviews.author: kayla gaston

customer_reviews.title: It's a very soft linen-like cotton and quite comfortable for sitting / swinging / hanging
customer_reviews.text: You probably can't beat this chair for the price / value. It's a very soft linen-like cotton and quite comfortable for sitting / swinging / hanging. However, the pillows are cute, but worthless (no substance; kind of like a big, soft cotton ball) and they really don't provide any support / comfort while sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has this under her loft bed. It is super sturdy and handles her swinging in it all day. Her friends love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Hopeh87

customer_reviews.title: My daughter likes it
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, ready to hang. It had a strong musty smell on arrival but it has since faded.
customer_reviews.author: PrimoWorks

customer_reviews.title: Good for price.. couple design flaws/skimps
customer_reviews.text: I like it however two of the strings already snapped. Still usable but will just get weaker and weaker now. The pillows that came with it are a joke, but I don't let that stop me from havin a bad day. Gets a decent amount of use. I recommend buying a quality swivel to attach it too
customer_reviews.author: rekleind

customer_reviews.title: Absolutly love!
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. My hammock swing arrived on time and I was so stoked to put it up when I got home from work. It's easy to install and super sturdy and comfy. If I had to list one negative it would be the pillows barely have any filler. I may add more later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy hanging chair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter luvs this chair. She likes to read or listen to music sitting in it. Thx D E Lamb
customer_reviews.author: Douglas E Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Such a perfect addition to my backyard. Can sit comfortably and read. I try to take it down when not using but did leave it in the rain once or twice and it dries with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Jenai

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: This was much better than expected. It is amazingly comfortable. You will need a to buy the equipment to hang it though.
customer_reviews.author: David stone

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Constructed
customer_reviews.text: The loops that hold each side of the hammock on the wooden bar slide around and make you fall out of your seat. Cheap
customer_reviews.author: Emily Altobelli

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cozy
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect deck chair. It is well made and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: sandye dixon

customer_reviews.title: Collapse when sitting
customer_reviews.text: We have these for our main seats in our living room. One collapses just about every time you sit in it. Kind of disappointing. If it weren’t for this, I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: TomAndLaura

customer_reviews.title: Nice to sit and swing
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I have it hanging from my tree in my backyard. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: B.J. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Dont leave outside
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed with Scotch guard but it still got sun spots in less than 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Catey C.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than noted. Very uncomfortable and cheap. Total junk
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Mildews very easy.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these hammocks to hang on stands on my small apartment porch. They are very cute and comfy. However, I’ve had them less than 3 months and they are covered in mildew ☹️ My porch is covered and rain doesn’t fall on the porch. Being in California weather I figured that these would last at least one year or more. I will have to replace these to be able to enjoy the outdoor seating again this spring.
customer_reviews.author: Ivory

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: This swing is a hunk of junk. After having it up for 3 weeks, it fell a part. The ropes came completely unraveled. Do not recommend. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: w

customer_reviews.title: I bought this just to see if I would like something like this at our cabin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just to see if I would like something like this at our cabin. I placed a chair cushion in it instead of the small ones that came with it and it made all the difference, so comfortable and fun to sit in! Love my new seat 💛
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functionality
customer_reviews.text: The pics make it appear like you can lay in it, however that is not the case. Also the pillow are very tiny not like it appears in the pics! Aesthetically it is pleasing however not very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Abu-Rub

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hang need to purchase hooks for porch  separately
customer_reviews.text: Wish the price was lower;) I would buy more everyone loves sitting in this chair on a beautiful day on front porch when they come over! Pretty strong fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Brass

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: Came stinky.. threw away the cheap pillows because they smelled like mildew. The swing isn't the best craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very confortable
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would make this better is if it came with an eye screw and rope to hang it with.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Hammock Chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! I am always moving, so being cozy while also able to swing is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one for each of our boys and they love it. It's definitely not sized for a large person, but for young adolescents and average-sized women, this is great. Please make sure you hang it from a sturdy point in the ceiling using hardware with a good weight limit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable seat
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes it. Had to modify the mounting slightly to fit on her chair frame, but it worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: George Mc

customer_reviews.title: Maybe when snow melts I can tell you
customer_reviews.text: There is 6 inches of snow on ground and temp was 26 degrees this am Ask me in 60 days!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharen Suste

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and fun to use. I have it outside under a tree and it seems to be durable
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the chair the only thing you would like if for a holder for her drink.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is exactly as advertised. It appears to be of high quality material and very well made! However, during shipping, the packaging opened and the chair is heavily soiled, appears to be the oily grease that’s common in warehouses. I’m gonna try to wash it before contacting the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Ashlynn Kelley

customer_reviews.title: I was happy ... until ...
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this chair at first - no odors or other issues complained of in reviews. However, it's only been three months & the rope on spreader bar keeps slipping, causing the chair to collapse while sitting in it. So very bummed...
customer_reviews.author: Tracey C.

customer_reviews.title: Boho fab for a great price
customer_reviews.text: It is the crown jewel of my boho balcony. High quality, soft. Does not come with hanging hardware but got a 500lb hanging kit also on amazon. Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality
customer_reviews.text: Not sure product came defective or not but with in less than 1 year of use , strings of swing became loose and it is now inclined towards one side.. Not a good product and I didn't see any information to contact seller to request replacement of this product as purchase is less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: good_deal_rd

customer_reviews.title: Strong musty smell. Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just opened this as her bday gift. Looks okay, haven't tried to hang it yet. Noticed a smell even before she opened the box. Once out of the box it had a strong musty smell. I'm hoping that the smell will go away after airing it out for a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toxic smell
customer_reviews.text: The item smelled very badly after opening it. It had a strong chemical-like smell and also smelled very musty. Returned it shortly after receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My family love it. Needs to be assembled little better it seems is coming apart on an area around the loops.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Picture is misleading
customer_reviews.text: Product just arrived and when unpacked the cushions do not fill the chair as the picture indicates. Plus, they are several inches smaller than the 17x17 advertised. Due to the hassle involved, not sure if I will bother to return. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the average sized adult
customer_reviews.text: It fits me perfectly (5’5”, and like to sit cross-legged), and is so comfortable! My husband is 6’3” with long legs, and he also likes it, but doesn’t fit quite as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. White

customer_reviews.title: Love to read and I love to sit and relax ...
customer_reviews.text: Love to read and I love to sit and relax in my hammock chair while reading. It's comfortable, yet not as much as another one I had.
customer_reviews.author: 119smunoz@gmail.com

customer_reviews.title: Loose ties wont last!!
customer_reviews.text: Cool chair for meditation, reading or just general hanging out. Unfortunately within just days of use, the ropes become loose and slip all over the place. The hammock collapsed in on itself and its unsittable :( Good concept and design, maybe I got a fluke. Not happy with the loose ties
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Hammock Chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair!! So relaxing and comfortable. Cute and gives a touch of whimsy to my garden!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie L Brignolo

customer_reviews.title: NO METAL HANGING DEVICE
customer_reviews.text: The only negative is, it didn't come w/the metal O-ring, depicted in the picture. It's simply a macrame ring.
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: Its small. Good for kids / teens
customer_reviews.text: Not sure who thinks this is good for even a medium height person. Its small but great for kids. Needs additional hardware like S-hooks, swivel hooks, chain to make it hang lower. About $15 more for that hardware.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product Is very sturdy, lightweight and easy to assemble. Such a great time. It is hanging on my front porch now. Love it will keep ordering
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy hammock chair! I got this to put up in my sons room, he loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: avalon gridley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Put on c hanging stand in her room. Great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Swing on!
customer_reviews.text: I love it but am so happy to have a brother in law who works in carpentry bc a little extra sturdiness was necessary than what was recommended w the swing.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi MD

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: The only negative I would say it the pillows definitely do not work the way they look like they would in the picture. They are two small pillows which really function at all for this product.
customer_reviews.author: K121188

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Description said it came with cushion pillows but it didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: LeighAnn Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! We put it up in my daughter's room ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! We put it up in my daughter's room and she loves it. Sturdy fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F.

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: Hangs in my room because I got tired of normal chairs and I love It. Anyone that comes to visit is obsessed with my chair as well. I read in It all the time
customer_reviews.author: Alia Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: True to color and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Hung this in my 11 y.o. room. It is very sturdy and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Laaberg

customer_reviews.title: Both of them came broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two and was very excited to hang them on my balcony. I just received them in the mail and they are both broken. It has been months and NO ONE has reached out to me, and I cannot return them.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sherman

customer_reviews.title: I bought hard wear they recommend to Hang it .
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a few day . I bought it for my teenage granddaughter and she loved it . It’s hanging in her bed room
customer_reviews.author: Jeannewilson

product_meta.title: CCTRO Hanging Rope Hammock Chair Swing Seat, Large Brazilian Hammock Net Chair Porch Chair for Yard, Bedroom, Patio, Porch, Indoor, Outdoor - 2 Seat Cushions Included
feature_bullets: IF YOU NEED THE HANGING KITS FOR THIS HAMMOCK,PLEASE SEARCH: B07X23YL2G. High Quality: Made of sturdy cotton and polyester fabric. High quality construction ensures this hammock chair will never tear or break with regular use

Large & Comfortable: This hanging tent size is 51" x 39", with plenty of room to relax and stretch out. The soft and thick cotton rope with TWO cushions, can holds up to 260lbs. An amazing seat for kids and adults alike at any time of day
Convenience: This hammock chair is outfitted with a loop-end top and easy to hang almost anywhere and easy to relocate. Simply find a branch, beam or hammock stand and set it up in seconds
Multifunction: Suitable for all ages and can be used in any indoor or outdoor space. Perfect for bedroom, yard, patio, porch or on the beach. Vibrant colors also can decor your yard or porch
Size: 51x 39 inches / 130x 100 cm Wooden bar size: 39" / 100cm Diameter: 1.5" / 3.8cm Weight Capacity: 220-260 lbs / 100-120 kg Cushions Size: approx 17x 17 inches / 45x 45cm
